title: Convert web application to Progressive Web App (PWA)

requirements.text: Create a Web App Manifest file (frontend/public/manifest.json) that defines the app name as 'Bho Creation Inventory', sets the app as standalone display mode, configures app icons for various sizes (192x192, 512x512), and specifies the start URL and theme colors matching the current amber/orange color scheme

quotes: Ab ise ek app me convert kar do

acceptanceCriteria: Manifest file exists at frontend/public/manifest.json with valid JSON structure
App name is set to 'Bho Creation Inventory'
Display mode is set to 'standalone' for app-like experience
Theme color matches the existing amber/orange color palette from index.css
Start URL is configured to launch the main application

requirements.text: Register a Service Worker (frontend/public/sw.js) that implements offline caching strategy for static assets (HTML, CSS, JS, images) and enables the app to function when internet connection is temporarily unavailable

quotes: Ab ise ek app me convert kar do

acceptanceCriteria: Service worker file exists at frontend/public/sw.js
Service worker caches all critical static assets on installation
App shell loads from cache when offline
Service worker updates automatically when new version is deployed

requirements.text: Update frontend/index.html to include the web app manifest link reference and add meta tags for mobile app configuration including viewport settings, apple-mobile-web-app-capable, and theme-color meta tags

quotes: Ab ise ek app me convert kar do

acceptanceCriteria: Manifest link tag is present in index.html head section
Meta tag for theme-color is configured with amber color
Meta tag for apple-mobile-web-app-capable is set to 'yes'
Meta tag for apple-mobile-web-app-status-bar-style is configured

requirements.text: Update frontend/src/main.tsx to register the service worker on application load, handling service worker lifecycle events (install, activate, update) and providing user notifications when new app versions are available

quotes: Ab ise ek app me convert kar do

acceptanceCriteria: Service worker registration code is added to main.tsx
Registration only occurs in production builds (not development)
User receives notification when app update is available
Service worker errors are logged for debugging

requirements.text: Add an install prompt component (frontend/src/components/InstallPrompt.tsx) that detects when the app can be installed to the home screen and displays a banner or button prompting users to 'Add to Home Screen' with appropriate messaging for Android and iOS devices

quotes: Ab ise ek app me convert kar do

acceptanceCriteria: Install prompt component detects beforeinstallprompt event on Android
Component displays appropriate install instructions for iOS users
User can dismiss the install prompt
Install prompt respects user's previous dismissal decision

requirements.text: Optimize the application for mobile touch interactions by ensuring all interactive elements have adequate touch target sizes (minimum 44x44 pixels), implementing touch-friendly gestures for barcode scanning, and improving form input experiences on mobile keyboards

quotes: Ab ise ek app me convert kar do

acceptanceCriteria: All buttons and clickable elements meet minimum 44x44px touch target size
Form inputs trigger appropriate mobile keyboard types (numeric for quantity, email for email fields)
Barcode scanner interface is optimized for mobile touch controls
Mobile navigation gestures work smoothly without conflicts

constraints: Must remain a web-based application accessible through browsers
Cannot generate native Android or iOS code
Must maintain all existing authentication functionality (Internet Identity and username/password)
Must preserve existing backend Motoko code and single-actor architecture
Must maintain compatibility with desktop browsers while optimizing for mobile
Do not modify immutable frontend paths: hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, hooks/useActor.ts, main.tsx service worker registration aside, components/ui
nonGoals: Native Android app development or APK generation
Native iOS app development or IPA generation
App Store or Google Play Store submission
Native device API access beyond standard web APIs
Push notifications through native mobile services
Bluetooth or NFC hardware integration beyond web standards

required: App icon for Progressive Web App with Bho Creation logo, optimized for mobile home screens (app-icon-192.dim_192x192.png)
App icon for Progressive Web App with Bho Creation logo, high resolution for splash screens (app-icon-512.dim_512x512.png)
Apple Touch Icon for iOS home screen with Bho Creation logo (apple-touch-icon.dim_180x180.png)
